Focus Boost - Productivity Reminder

Boost your productivity and stay motivated with Focus Boost, the ultimate Chrome extension designed to keep you on track with timely reminders and motivational quotes. Whether you're working from home or in the office, Focus Boost helps you maintain focus and achieve your goals.


Key Features:

Customizable Intervals: Set personalized reminder intervals to suit your workflow and ensure you stay on task.

Motivational Quotes: Receive inspiring quotes to keep your spirits high and your mind focused.

Work Hours Configuration: Define your work hours to receive reminders only when you need them.

Seamless Notifications: Get unobtrusive notifications that remind you to take breaks or refocus without interrupting your workflow.

User-Friendly Interface: Easy to set up and use, with a clean and intuitive design.


Why Choose Focus Boost?
Focus Boost is more than just a reminder tool; it's your personal productivity partner. By integrating seamlessly into your daily routine, it helps you manage your time effectively and stay motivated throughout the day. Perfect for professionals, students, and anyone looking to enhance their productivity.

Get Started Today!

Download Focus Boost now and take the first step towards a more productive and focused workday.

FAQ
1. How do I install Focus Boost?

To install Focus Boost, visit the Chrome Web Store, search for "Focus Boost - Productivity Reminder," and click "Add to Chrome." Follow the prompts to complete the installation.

2. Why am I not receiving notifications?

Ensure that notifications are enabled in your Chrome settings. Also, check that your work hours and reminder intervals are correctly configured in the extension settings.

3. Can I customize the reminder intervals?

Yes, you can set personalized reminder intervals in the extension settings to match your workflow needs.

4. How can I provide feedback or report a bug?
You can provide feedback or report issues through the Chrome Web Store page or directly through the extension at the very bottom of the interface. We appreciate your input to help us improve the extension.
